it.unipr.ce.dsg.s2p.peer
Class PeerListManager

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,NeighborPeerDescriptor>
          it.unipr.ce.dsg.s2p.peer.PeerListManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,NeighborPeerDescriptor>
public class PeerListManager
extends java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,NeighborPeerDescriptor>

Class PeerListManager extends Hashtable used to hold the peer descriptor of known peers.

For each peer descriptor is associated the key of the peer.

Author:
Fabrizio Caramia
See Also:
